#include<stdio.h>
void count_carry(int *a,int *b,int i,int j,int *ptr)
{
    int k,count=0,temp=0;
    for(k=0;k<j;k++)
    {
                    if(a[k]+b[k]+temp>9){
                    temp=(temp+a[k]+b[k])/10;
                    count++;}
                    } 
     *ptr=count;
     }
int main()
{
        
      
       while(1){
                int s,t;
                int a[20],b[20],i=0,j=0,ptr;
                  scanf("%d%d",&s,&t); 
                  if(s==0&&t==0)    
                  break;  
                  else if(s==0||t==0)
                  {
                       printf("No carry operation.\n");     
                  continue; 
                  }
                  else
                  {
                     while(s!=0)
                     {
                                a[i]=s%10;
                                s=s/10;
                                i++;
                                }
                                while(t!=0)
                                {
                                           b[j]=t%10;
                                           t=t/10;
                                           j++;
                                           } 
                      
                      if(i>j)
                      count_carry(a,b,i,j,&ptr);
                      else
                      count_carry(b,a,j,i,&ptr);
                      if(ptr==1)
                      printf("1 carry operation.\n");
                      else if(ptr==0)
                      printf("No carry operation.\n");
                      else
                      printf("%d carry operations.\n",ptr);
                     }
                        }
                              return 0;
    }
